mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.email, u.password_hash, u.name, u.avatar_url, u.status, u.last_login_at, u.created_at, u.updated_at, ( SELECT r.name FROM user_roles ur JOIN roles r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = u.id ORDER BY r.name LIMIT 1 ) AS role FROM users u ORDER BY u.created_at DESC

SELECT u.id, u.email, u.password_hash, u.name, u.avatar_url, u.status, u.last_login_at, u.created_at, u.updated_at, ( SELECT r.name FROM user_roles ur JOIN roles r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = u.id ORDER BY r.name LIMIT 1 ) AS role FROM users u WHERE u.email = #{email} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( id, email, password_hash, name, avatar_url, status, last_login_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{user.id}, #{user.email}, #{user.passwordHash}, #{user.name}, #{user.avatarUrl}, #{user.status}, #{user.lastLoginAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{user.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{user.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM roles WHERE name = #{name} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roles (id, name, description) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{name}, #{description}) ON CONFLICT (name) DO NOTHING
INSERT INTO user_roles (user_id, role_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roleId}) ON CONFLICT (user_id, role_id) DO NOTHING
